law.text: The total amount of indemnity payable by credit health insurance in the event of disability, as defined in the policy, shall not exceed the aggregate of the periodic scheduled unpaid installments of the indebtedness; and the amount of each periodic indemnity payment shall not exceed the original indebtedness divided by the number of periodic installments.
law.history: Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 19, sec. 5, effective June 18, 1970.
